arcwelder_enable.label: Arc Welder
arcwelder_enable.description: Convert multiple G0/G1 arc segments into G2/G3 arc movements.

arcwelder_maximum_radius.label: Maximum Arc Radius
arcwelder_maximum_radius.description: The maximum radius of any arc in mm.

arcwelder_tolerance.label: Tolerance
arcwelder_tolerance.description: The maximum allowable difference between the arc path and the original toolpath in the conversion of linear to arc moves.

arcwelder_resolution.label: Resolution
arcwelder_resolution.description: The resolution in mm of the of the output.  Determines the maximum tool path deviation allowed in the conversion of linear to arc moves.

arcwelder_firmware_compensation.label: Firmware compensation
arcwelder_firmware_compensation.description: Some firmware does not handle arcs with a small radius (under approximately 5mm depending on your settings), which will appear flat instead of curved. If larger arcs appear flat, it's likely that G2/G3 is disabled. This applies to Marlin 1.x (but NOT Marlin 2), Klipper (can be fixed by changing settings), and a few others. If you notice small radius arcs that print with a flat edge, you may need to enable firmware compensation. Note that compression may be reduced (perhaps drastically) when firmware compensation is enabled.

arcwelder_min_arc_segment.label: Minimum arc segments
arcwelder_min_arc_segment.description: The minimum number of segments in a full circle of the same radius as any given arc. Used to compensate for firmware without min-arc-segments setting.

arcwelder_mm_per_arc_segment.label: Mm per arc segment
arcwelder_mm_per_arc_segment.description: The mm per arc segment as defined in your firmware. Used to compensate for firmware without mini-arc-segments setting.

arcwelder_allow_3d_arcs.label: Allow 3d arcs
arcwelder_allow_3d_arcs.description: Allow 3d arcs, supporting Spiralize Outer Contour (vase mode). Not all firmware supports this.

arcwelder_g90_influences_extruder.label: G90 influences extruder
arcwelder_g90_influences_extruder.description: G90/G91 influences the extruder axis mode in the conversion of linear to arc moves. Marlin 2.0 and forks should have this box checked.  Many forks of Marlin 1.x should have this unchecked, like the Prusa MK2 and MK3.
